channel.title: üè¢ University of Copenhagen on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Copenhagen on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: BMRS: Bayesian Model Reduction for Structured Pruning
item.description: BMRS: Bayesian Model Reduction for Structured Pruning offers a principled, threshold-free approach to neural network compression, achieving high accuracy and competitive efficiency.

item.title: Conditioning non-linear and infinite-dimensional diffusion processes
item.description: Conditioning infinite-dimensional nonlinear diffusion processes is made possible, enabling analysis of complex data like organism shapes in evolutionary biology.

item.title: Kermut: Composite kernel regression for protein variant effects
item.description: Kermut: A novel Gaussian process regression model achieves state-of-the-art accuracy in predicting protein variant effects and provides reliable uncertainty estimates, crucial for protein engineering …

item.title: LoQT: Low-Rank Adapters for Quantized Pretraining
item.description: LoQT enables efficient large language model training on consumer hardware via quantized weights and low-rank weight updates, overcoming memory limitations.
